content: Youâ€™re about to switch to the <1>{{planName}} plan</1>.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message when switching plans, indicating which plan is being switched to. It appears in a modal dialog header and is triggered by an update plan button container, prompting users to confirm their plan change.

usage.context:
<ModalDialog.Header>{t("PlanUpgrade")}</ModalDialog.Header>
 <ModalDialog.Body>
 <StyledModalBody>
 <Text>
 <Trans
 i18nKey="SwitchPlan"
 ns="Payments"
 t={t}
 values={{ planName: tariffPlanTitle }}
 components={{
 1: <span style={{ fontWeight: 600 }} />,
